abstract: The Advertising column on Sept. 30, about the Wachovia Corporation’s suspending a decision to hire new agencies after reaching an agreement to be acquired by Citigroup, misstated the name of one of the WPP Group agencies that would have worked for Wachovia. It is Maxus, not Maxum. (Wachovia has since entered into a new agreement to be acquired by Wells Fargo.).

lead_paragraph: The Advertising column on Sept. 30, about the Wachovia Corporation’s suspending a decision to hire new agencies after reaching an agreement to be acquired by Citigroup, misstated the name of one of the WPP Group agencies that would have worked for Wachovia. It is Maxus, not Maxum. (Wachovia has since entered into a new agreement to be acquired by Wells Fargo.)
